Breadth-First.Explanation: Initial broad clue collection and overall planning without a specific location hypothesis

Depth-First.Explanation: Focused verification by analyzing license plates and vehicle details to narrow region
Converging on Oxford by confirming architectural style and signage clues
Verifying High Street location using bus stop placement and street curvature
Detailed comparison with Google Street View to match building details and perspective
Final confirmation through landmark alignment and Street View
KeyElement: University Church of St Mary the Virgin

Depth-First.Explanation: Summarizing confirmed location based on accumulated verification steps
Further precise verification of angle, curve, and sign details to finalize the shot origin

Breadth-Depth Switch.Explanation: After initial broad planning, the analysis shifts to focused verification of specific geographic clues
